Summary: 2 peice (attached)Upper appeared green or flaming lower red and square.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object appeared bright and at high altitude.It appeared to be on fire.Real bright lighting appeared to be a flame of sorts.The craft appeared to be under control and not spirialing down.it was on a east to west direction.The upper portion appeared to be larger roundish and the bottom (red part)appeared to be square.I watched this craft till it went over the horizion and was gone.It appeared the track was snaking alittle .from the left to the right somewhat.The speed from here looked slow.But at that altitude it must have been going very fast.I previously was a mufon member and private pilot with cival air patrol.I was unable to complete my membership due to a accident that left me disabled.So I know a ufo when I see one.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in St Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St Petersburg on or around October 2nd 2010
